Identification_Area.title: GIOTTO EXTENDED MISSION, RADIO SCIENCE EXPERIMENT V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: GIOTTO EXTENDED MISSION, RADIO SCIENCE EXPERIMENT V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: This dataset includes open- and closed-loop data from the Giotto Radio Experiment (GRE) during the time range +/- 3 minutes around close approach. (SAVED DATA)
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This dataset includes open- and closed-loop data from the Giotto Radio Experiment (GRE) during the time range +/- 3 minutes around close approach. In both cases the data were received by station 63 in Madrid. These data were never formally reviewed by PDS.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This dataset includes open- and closed-loop data from the Giotto Radio Experiment (GRE) during the time range +/- 3 minutes around close approach. In both cases the data were received by station 63 in Madrid.
Parameters ========== There are two files in this set. The closed-loop file contains dopplercount and X-band frequency information vs time. The open-loop file lists frequency and signal information vs time.
The times listed in the file are ground-received times in UTC of the end of the measurement.
Data ==== There are two separate data files:
gemgrecl Closed-loop data gemgreol Open-loop data
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= The absolute time tages at the NASA DSN are controlled by cesium/ hydrogen maser standards. It is stated that there are referenced to within 10 microseconds of UTC.
Review ====== This dataset never underwent formal PDs review and archiving.
